# SN1987A heavy ALP bound
# Taken from SN1987A gamma and neutrino bound from https://arxiv.org/pdf/2109.03244.pdf
# Mass [eV] g_agamma [GeV^{-1}]
952.4770302969304	 6.217688227110858e-10
9912351.242348434	 6.218592429587621e-12
